mapper.update: update ark_uims_rbac_rule_scope set id = #{ruleScopeDO.id}, name = #{ruleScopeDO.name}, is_select_data = #{ruleScopeDO.isSelectData}, data_source = #{ruleScopeDO.dataSource}, data_source_sql = #{ruleScopeDO.dataSourceSql}, select_show_form = #{ruleScopeDO.selectShowForm}, sort = #{ruleScopeDO.sort}, create_time = #{ruleScopeDO.createTime} where id = #{id}
